name: Stickman: Summer Games
description:
************************
This "Summer Games" Edition features various summer sport events.

To control the stick figure simply use the touch screen. Quickly Tap to gain speed, tap again to jump, or hold and release to throw.
Its that simple. Easy control, quite challenging, maximum fun.

************************
FULL VERSION FEATURES
************************
- Javelin Throw
- 100 meters
- 400 meters
- 1500 meters
- 110 meters hurdle
- 400 meters hurdle
- Long Jump
- Openfeint 2.4 social networking
- Offline personal best highscore
- Online highscore and leaderboards

The lite version only has Javelin Throw, 100 meters and 1500 meters and no Openfeint support or online highscore.

Please let us know if you like this game so we know we should continue providing new games. Don't hestitate telling us about new features and game types you would like to see in future updates.

E.g. Pole Vault or High Jump? You decide.
